content: + 1-year subscription for functionality and security updates.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a one-year subscription license description, indicating the duration and benefits of the upgraded plan. It will appear in a banner or similar UI element, likely on a payment page or benefits container. The translation should convey a sense of time-based duration.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The plus sign (+) is not consistently formatted. It should be a standard '+' character.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace the plus sign with a standard '+' character: "+ 1 illik abun…ô."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Updates von Funktionalit√§t und Sicherheit innerhalb vom 1-j√§hrigen Abonnement" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "+ 1-year subscription for functionality and security updates." It literally translates to '+ Updates of functionality and security within the 1-year subscription.' It loses the concept of the updates being *part of* or *included in* the subscription.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: + 1 Jahr Abonnement f√ºr Funktions- und Sicherheitsupdates.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'vom' is slightly awkward. 'F√ºr' (for) is generally preferred in this context for clarity and flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replacing 'innerhalb vom' with 'f√ºr' improves readability.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Greek translation includes a space before the '+' sign. While not technically incorrect, it deviates from the English original which does not have this space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the space before the '+' sign: '+ œÉœÖŒΩŒ¥œÅŒøŒºŒÆ 1 Œ≠œÑŒøœÖœÇ Œ≥ŒπŒ± ŒµŒΩŒ∑ŒºŒµœÅœéœÉŒµŒπœÇ ŒªŒµŒπœÑŒøœÖœÅŒ≥ŒπŒ∫œåœÑŒ∑œÑŒ±œÇ Œ∫Œ±Œπ Œ±œÉœÜŒ¨ŒªŒµŒπŒ±œÇ.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The '+' sign at the beginning of the French translation should be consistent with the English content.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: + 1 an d'abonnement aux mises √† jour au niveau des fonctionnalit√©s et de la s√©curit√©.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "functionality and security updates" is not perfectly conveyed by "÷Ü’∏÷Ç’∂’Ø÷Å’´’∏’∂’°’¨’∏÷Ç’©’µ’°’∂ ÷á ’°’∂’æ’ø’°’∂’£’∏÷Ç’©’µ’°’∂ ’©’°÷Ä’¥’°÷Å’∏÷Ç’¥’∂’•÷Ä’´ ’∞’°’¥’°÷Ä". A more accurate translation might focus on 'functionality and security enhancements' or a similar concept.
The plus sign (+) is placed before the year, which is not standard in Japanese. It should be after the 'for'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ê©üËÉΩ„Åä„Çà„Å≥„Çª„Ç≠„É•„É™„ÉÜ„Ç£„Ç¢„ÉÉ„Éó„Éá„Éº„Éà„ÅÆ„Åü„ÇÅ„ÅÆ1Âπ¥Èñì„ÅÆ„Çµ„Éñ„Çπ„ÇØ„É™„Éó„Ç∑„Éß„É≥Ôºã„ÄÇ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of '„Åü„ÇÅ„ÅÆ' (tame no) implies purpose rather than a direct subscription *for* updates. It might be slightly less natural. Consider revising for a more straightforward 'for' relationship.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ê©üËÉΩ„Åä„Çà„Å≥„Çª„Ç≠„É•„É™„ÉÜ„Ç£„Ç¢„ÉÉ„Éó„Éá„Éº„Éà„ÅÆ1Âπ¥Èñì„ÅÆ„Çµ„Éñ„Çπ„ÇØ„É™„Éó„Ç∑„Éß„É≥„ÄÇ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation is a literal translation and doesn't flow naturally in Korean. 'Í∏∞Îä• Î∞è Î≥¥Ïïà ÏóÖÎç∞Ïù¥Ìä∏Ïóê ÎåÄÌïú' is overly formal and verbose.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: + 1ÎÖÑ ÎèôÏïà Í∏∞Îä• Î∞è Î≥¥Ïïà ÏóÖÎç∞Ïù¥Ìä∏ Ï†úÍ≥µ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The plus sign (+) is in the Korean translation, but its placement could be improved for better visual flow, potentially after the '+'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: + Í∏∞Îä• Î∞è Î≥¥Ïïà ÏóÖÎç∞Ïù¥Ìä∏Ïóê ÎåÄÌïú 1ÎÖÑ Íµ¨ÎèÖ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "‡∫Å‡∫≤‡∫ô‡ªÄ‡∫Æ‡∫±‡∫î‡∫ß‡∫Ω‡∫Å" (kan heuangk) in the Lao translation, which translates to 'work' or 'functionality', is too broad. While 'functionality' is present in the English, it's not the best translation of 'functionality and security updates'. A more accurate translation would capture the aspect of feature updates alongside security.
The translation 'Roczna subskrypcja umo≈ºliwiajƒÖca uzyskanie aktualizacji zabezpiecze≈Ñ i funkcji' is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the benefit of having the updates.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Roczna subskrypcja zapewniajƒÖca aktualizacje zabezpiecze≈Ñ i funkcji.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'functionality and security updates' is not perfectly translated. '√émbunƒÉtƒÉ»õirea func»õionalitƒÉ»õii' implies an improvement, not just updates.  It's a slightly more active phrasing than simply stating updates are provided.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Abonament de 1 an cu actualizƒÉri pentru func»õionalitate »ôi securitate.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "+ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π –∏ –±–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –≤ —Ç–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ 1 –≥–æ–¥–∞." is a literal translation that loses some of the nuance of the original English. A more natural Russian phrasing would be something like '+ –ø–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ 1 –≥–æ–¥, –≤–∫–ª—é—á–∞—é—â–∞—è –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ –±–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏.'
The plus sign (+) is not standard in Russian for pre-pending text. It might be better to omit it or use a different marker.
The Sinhala translation uses a Sinhala numeral 'ëá°' which is not standard. It should be replaced with the Arabic numeral 1 for better readability and consistency.
The word '–∞–∂—É—Ä–∏—Ä–∞—ö–∞' is spelled correctly, but it might be better to use a more natural phrasing for marketing materials. While technically correct, it sounds somewhat formal.
The '+' sign before '1-year' is missing in the Turkish translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Add a '+' sign before '1 yƒ±llƒ±k' to match the English content: '+1 yƒ±llƒ±k abonelik'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'functionality' isn't directly conveyed in the translation. 'Ch·ª©c nƒÉng' can mean function, but in this context, it's not the best fit. A better translation would emphasize the *features* provided by the subscription.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: + ƒêƒÉng k√Ω 1 nƒÉm ƒë·ªÉ c·∫≠p nh·∫≠t t√≠nh nƒÉng v√† b·∫£o m·∫≠t.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The plus sign (+) is inconsistent with standard Vietnamese sentence structure. It's more natural to omit it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ƒêƒÉng k√Ω 1 nƒÉm ƒë·ªÉ c·∫≠p nh·∫≠t t√≠nh nƒÉng v√† b·∫£o m·∫≠t.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The '+' sign at the beginning of the Albanian translation should be consistent with the English content. It's a plus sign indicating an additional benefit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: + Abonim 1-vje√ßar p√´r p√´rdit√´simet e funksionalitetit dhe siguris√´.
